CustomField.description: The name of an apex class which can be used to dynamically retrieve a Database.QueryLocator, or a List<SObject> This allows for more complex SOQL queries that couldn't otherwise be done in the MDT itself This class must have a public zero-arg constructor, and extends the GarbageCollector abstract class.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This class must have a public zero-arg constructor, and extends the GarbageCollector abstract class
CustomField.label: Apex Class Name
